Description: Eight joining fragments (including 1924,1201.861 and 865) of North Ionian pottery rosette bowl; glaze fired orange; interior glazed; exterior: at lip, rosette between sets of vertical tongues; below two broad bands and a finer line preserved.
Curator's comments: The sherd joins British Museum 1924,1201.867 (which is a duplicated number; see 1886,0401.795).
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIII, no. 325)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 670, no. 286)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.854)
